content: sts k2tog k1 needle three k1 ssk k to end four stitches decreased row 2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 4 4 5 5 6 sts on needle one 8 8 10 10 12 sts on needle two 4 4 5 5 6 sts on needle three using needle three k the four sts on needle one you should now have 8 8 10 10 12 sts on each of the two remaining needles cut yarn leaving a tail of at least 18 long thread tapestry needle and graft toe closed using the kitchener stitch weave in ends kitchener stitch tutorial https //www purlsoho com/create/kitchener-stitch-video/ thank you for downloading my pattern i appreciate your support any comments or suggestions can be sent to yarncafecreations@gmail com and don t forget to check out my hand-dyed yarn here https //yarncafecreations com copyright 2020 yarn café creations christy houghton
